evaluation.Q1: Does the chart effectively compare the average N, P, K values across different crops?

feedback.improvement: The use of three separate bar charts for N, P, and K values
Adjust the y-axis scales to be consistent across all three charts for easier comparison

evaluation.Q2: Are the 'rice' values highlighted with distinct colors that make them stand out from other crops?

feedback.improvement: The use of red color to highlight rice values

evaluation.Q3: Are there clear text annotations displaying the average N, P, K values for 'rice' and 'wheat' crops?

feedback.improvement: Include text annotations for rice and wheat crops showing their specific N, P, K values

evaluation.Q4: Is the chart easy to read and interpret for agricultural researchers, farmers, and agronomists?

feedback.improvement: Clear labeling of crops and nutrient values
Increase font size for better readability

evaluation.Q5: Does the chart use a bar format to represent the data?

feedback.improvement: The use of bar charts for data representation

evaluation.Q6: Are the crop types clearly labeled on the X-axis?

feedback.improvement: Clear labeling of crop types on the X-axis
Rotate the x-axis labels for better readability

evaluation.Q7: Does the Y-axis scale appropriately capture the range of nutrient values?

feedback.improvement: Y-axis scales that cover the range of values for each nutrient
Standardize the Y-axis scales across all three charts for easier comparison

evaluation.Q8: Is there a clear and informative title that conveys the purpose of the visualization?

feedback.improvement: Titles for each chart indicating the nutrient being displayed
Include an overarching title for the entire visualization

evaluation.Q9: Are the bars arranged in a way that facilitates easy comparison between crops?

feedback.improvement: Consistent ordering of crops across all three charts

evaluation.Q10: Is there a legend that explains the color coding or bar groupings?

feedback.improvement: Include a legend explaining the color coding, especially for the highlighted rice values

evaluation.Q11: Does the chart maintain a good balance between visual appeal and data clarity?

feedback.improvement: Clean layout and color scheme
Adjust spacing between charts for better overall composition

evaluation.Q12: Is the use of colors, fonts, and styles consistent throughout the chart?

feedback.improvement: Consistent use of colors and fonts across all three charts

evaluation.Q13: Are there any unnecessary elements that create visual clutter?

feedback.improvement: Clean design without unnecessary elements

evaluation.Q14: Would the chart be easily readable for individuals with color vision deficiencies?

feedback.improvement: Use of contrasting colors for rice values
Consider using patterns or textures in addition to colors for better accessibility

evaluation.Q15: Does the chart make efficient use of space to maximize data visibility?

feedback.improvement: Efficient use of space with three side-by-side charts
Adjust the aspect ratio of each chart for better overall composition
